name: Along With Heroic Spirits
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
During the character trial event "Along With Heroic Spirits," Trailblazers can use set teams that include trial characters to repeatedly experience specific stages.
Team Lineup, character levels, and the equipped Light Cones and Relics cannot be changed while experiencing the event stage.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Rewards for the trial stage can be obtained from the "Along With Heroic Spirits" screen after completing the stage. Each trial stage reward may only be claimed once during the event.
